posts.title: map操作符
posts.text: map ==Map== 基本算是 ==RxJava== 中一个最简单的操作符了，熟悉 RxJava 1.x 的知道，它的作用是对发射时间发送的每一个事件应用一个函数，是的每一个事件都按照指定的函数去变化，而在 2.x 中它的作用几乎一致 12345678910111213141516171819Observable.create(new ObservableOnSubscribe<Integer>() { @Override public void subscribe(ObservableEmitter<Integer> emitter) throws Exception { emitter.onNext(1); emitter.onNext(2); emitter.onNext(3); } }).map(new Function<Integer, Integer>() { @Override public Integer apply(Integer integer) throws Exception { a += integer; return a + integer; } }).subscribe(new Consumer<Integer>() { @Override public void accept(Integer s) throws Exception { Log.d("wyl", "accept : " + s + "\n"); } }); 运行结果 12310-16 11:42:48.322 1787-1787/com.wyl.demo.rxdemo D/wyl: accept : 210-16 11:42:48.322 1787-1787/com.wyl.demo.rxdemo D/wyl: accept : 510-16 11:42:48.322 1787-1787/com.wyl.demo.rxdemo D/wyl: accept : 9 map 基本作用就是将一个 Observable 通过某种函数关系，转换为另一种 Observable

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
